About Me

From Medicine to Machines: A Developer's Journey

I'm a builder at heart, driven by a passion for solving complex problems at the intersection of technology and human health. Originally on a pre-med track, I discovered my love for the logic and creativity of software development. Today, as a Systems Engineering Master's student at UVA, I'm developing AI-driven solutions for clinical trial automation and creating novel medical devices.

My goal is to leverage technology to build systems that are not only intelligent but also intuitive and impactful.
